reviews.review: Excelente jogo, acompanha certinho a história, vale muito a pena!
A good complement to the base Half Life 2 game. Expect the same enemies but slightly harder battles and puzzles. I enjoyed it.

The overpowered Gravity Gun at the beginning ruins the combine encounters, and the area you fight combine in in the beginning was to big and open, otherwise the civilian escort mission at the end was kinda stupid. 
But pretty good anyway!

Episode One es la continuación directa de Half-Life 2, y a pesar de ser significativamente mas corto que el juego principal, sigue la linea argumental y sabe ponernos en contexto. En esta nueva incursion de la segunda entrega, lo mas notorio es como el juego nos hace notar mas de cerca las emociones de los personajes, apreciando mas el desarrollo argumental de los mismos. Recomendado.
Excelente continuación del HL2, un poco corta, pero divertida. Suma más inquietudes a la historia.

Super adventure, lots of shooting and places with hidden weapons.



Super przygoda, dużo strzelania i miejsc z ukrytymi broniami.
Absolute masterpiece of a game. Can run on practically ANY old potato, would 100% recommend 10/10!

The story maintained in Half-Life 2 is continuing. I have finished the game recently and the game is very short, but I like short games. There is some new music I didn't like in some episodes. There isn't a lot of music, but ringing good music may affect people's motivation during the game. Without the music, there is nothing special in the game. Everything is the same. Places, weapons, characters. I will continue with Half-life 2 episode 2 now.
The atmosphere is insane in this game. Not sure what else to write everything else is really good too

Una continuación digna de uno de los mejores juegos de la historia, nos cuenta todo lo acontecido luego de lo sucedio en half life 2 y nos sumerge en una jugabilidad cooperativa junto a Alyx que es disfrutable ya realmente se siente como una compañera más y no como un estorbo como en otros videojuegos que presentan esta mecánica, las rmas y escenarios se mantienen y más esa exquisita banda sonora que harán de las batallas un deleite.

I enjoyed this a lot. I have always liked Half Life, but am not a die-hard fan. I read many reviews that said only die-hard fans of the series would like this, but I disagree. It was enjoyable. I only encountered a minor bug or two and completed the game on hard in about 3 hours. I did not speed run. I bought this years ago for $10 and I feel that the price is justified.
HL2E1 has great graphics and sound. it's challenging but still fun to play

Adolf Hitler (German: [ˈadɔlf ˈhɪtlɐ] (About this soundlisten); 20 April 1889 – 30 April 1945) was a German politician and leader of the Nazi Party (Nationalsozialistische Deutsche Arbeiterpartei; NSDAP). He rose to power as the chancellor of Germany in 1933 and then as Führer in 1934.[a] During his dictatorship from 1933 to 1945, he initiated World War II in Europe by invading Poland on 1 September 1939. He was closely involved in military operations throughout the war and was central to the perpetration of the Holocaust.

Hitler was born in Austria—then part of Austria-Hungary—and was raised near Linz. He moved to Germany in 1913 and was decorated during his service in the German Army in World War I. In 1919, he joined the German Workers' Party (DAP), the precursor of the NSDAP, and was appointed leader of the NSDAP in 1921. In 1923, he attempted to seize power in a failed coup in Munich and was imprisoned. In jail, he dictated the first volume of his autobiography and political manifesto Mein Kampf ("My Struggle"). After his release in 1924, Hitler gained popular support by attacking the Treaty of Versailles and promoting Pan-Germanism, anti-semitism and anti-communism with charismatic oratory and Nazi propaganda. He frequently denounced international capitalism and communism as part of a Jewish conspiracy.

By November 1932, the Nazi Party had the most seats in the German Reichstag but did not have a majority. As a result, no party was able to form a majority parliamentary coalition in support of a candidate for chancellor. Former chancellor Franz von Papen and other conservative leaders persuaded President Paul von Hindenburg to appoint Hitler as chancellor on 30 January 1933. Shortly after, the Reichstag passed the Enabling Act of 1933 which began the process of transforming the Weimar Republic into Nazi Germany, a one-party dictatorship based on the totalitarian and autocratic ideology of National Socialism. Hitler aimed to eliminate Jews from Germany and establish a New Order to counter what he saw as the injustice of the post-World War I international order dominated by Britain and France. His first six years in power resulted in rapid economic recovery from the Great Depression, the abrogation of restrictions imposed on Germany after World War I, and the annexation of territories inhabited by millions of ethnic Germans, which gave him significant popular support.

Hitler sought Lebensraum ("living space") for the German people in Eastern Europe, and his aggressive foreign policy is considered the primary cause of World War II in Europe. He directed large-scale rearmament and, on 1 September 1939, invaded Poland, resulting in Britain and France declaring war on Germany. In June 1941, Hitler ordered an invasion of the Soviet Union. By the end of 1941, German forces and the European Axis powers occupied most of Europe and North Africa. These gains were gradually reversed after 1941, and in 1945 the Allied armies defeated the German army. On 29 April 1945, he married his longtime lover Eva Braun. Less than two days later, the couple committed suicide to avoid capture by the Soviet Red Army. Their corpses were burned.

Under Hitler's leadership and racially motivated ideology, the Nazi regime was responsible for the genocide of about 6 million Jews and millions of other victims whom he and his followers deemed Untermenschen (subhumans) or socially undesirable. Hitler and the Nazi regime were also responsible for the killing of an estimated 19.3 million civilians and prisoners of war. In addition, 28.7 million soldiers and civilians died as a result of military action in the European theatre. The number of civilians killed during World War II was unprecedented in warfare, and the casualties constitute the deadliest conflict in history.

Hitler's actions and Nazi ideology are almost universally regarded as gravely immoral. According to Ian Kershaw, "Never in history has such ruination – physical and moral – been associated with the name of one man."[4]

This is very short but very fun game. I finished it and got the One Bullet Achievement. It was hard but I really liked it. The hospital battle really made me feel like an action hero and having Alyx along was pretty cool, too. If you finished HL2 and want to know what happens next, get this and do Episode 2 also.

Half Life 2 è stato una rivoluzione nel mondo videoludico grazie a Source e questa espansione è la migliore a parer mio, anche se personalmente lo avrebbero dovuto chiamare Half Life 2 Aftermath visti i fatti di questa espansione e poi potevate introdurre nuove skin almeno per gli zombie (ok gli Zombine e gli zombie di Half Life 2 sono i migliori), ma un po' di varietà estetica che vi costa. Il mio voto per questo capolavoro è 9/10

Análise do HL 2: Outro jogo revolucionário em seu lançamento, sendo considerado, corretamente, um dos melhores jogos do PC. Um dos poucos que entra em minha classificação de “masterpiece” assim como o primeiro. Gráfico, física, diálogos, personagens tudo muito bom e bem feito. Com certeza um título obrigatório para que se considera “PC MASTER RACE”
